title: User input validation can lead to DOS

profile.name: Twitter
profile.about: Twitter helps you create and share ideas and information instantly, without barriers.

vulnerability_information:
Hi Security Team,

**Summary:** 
There is no limit to the number of characters on phone numbers and using this you can perform a DOS Attack

**Description:**
On the input form of phone number in ***https://twitter.com/account/complete*** there's no Input validation using this you can send more payload and may cause of Denial of service or **503 Service Temporarily Unavailable**

## Steps To Reproduce:

So this is the normal page 
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

Input this payload on the Phone number textbox â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ then submit as you can see the payload was encoded on backend so the payload may load more

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

After submitting this is the response on burp **503 Service Temporarily Unavailable**

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

And on the page this is the result .

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

## Supporting Material/References:

+ payload.txt

Thank you! 
Regards

## Impact

Attacker can perform a DOS because of lack of input validation
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi Security Team,

Summary:
There is no limit to the number of characters on phone numbers and using this you can perform a DOS Attack

Description:
On the input form of phone number in https://twitter.com/account/complete there's no Input validation using this you can send more payload and may cause of Denial of service or 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable

Steps To Reproduce:

So this is the normal page
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

Input this payload on the Phone number textbox â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ then submit as you can see the payload was encoded on backend so the payload may load more

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

After submitting this is the response on burp 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

And on the page this is the result .

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

Supporting Material/References:

  • payload.txt

Thank you!
Regards

Impact

Attacker can perform a DOS because of lack of input validation

activities.message:
Thank you for your report @meepmerp,

`twitter.com/account/complete` page's URL seems to indicate that it is the final step in a signup flow.  This may be related to the `503 Service Temporarily Unavailable` error you encountered.

Can you tell us how you discovered `twitter.com/account/complete` page?  Did you find this page by clicking a button or leveraging a feature on Twitter's UI?

Thank you for thinking of Twitter security
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for your report @meepmerp,

twitter.com/account/complete page's URL seems to indicate that it is the final step in a signup flow. This may be related to the 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable error you encountered.

Can you tell us how you discovered twitter.com/account/complete page? Did you find this page by clicking a button or leveraging a feature on Twitter's UI?

Thank you for thinking of Twitter security

activities.message:
Thank you for your response @meepmerp,

We were able to reproduce the behavior you described and will get back to you when we have more information.

Thank you for thinking of Twitter security.

activities.message:
Thank you for your report. We believe it may be a valid security issue and will investigate it further. It could take some time to find and update the root cause for an issue, so we thank you for your patience.

Thank you for helping keep Twitter secure!
activities.markdown_message:

activities.message:
Hi @yongjink 

This vulnerability is working on the other endpoint like `https://twitter.com/account/begin_password_reset` with the same payload 

Thank you !
Best Regards.
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @yongjink

This vulnerability is working on the other endpoint like https://twitter.com/account/begin_password_reset with the same payload

Thank you !
Best Regards.

activities.message:
## Remediation:

+ Implementing input validation
+ Validating free-form Unicode text
+ Define the allowed set of characters to be accepted.
+ Minimum and maximum value range

Thank you !
Best Regards !
activities.markdown_message:
Remediation:

  • Implementing input validation
  • Validating free-form Unicode text
  • Define the allowed set of characters to be accepted.
  • Minimum and maximum value range

Thank you !
Best Regards !

activities.message:
Hey @meepmerp, the bounty awarded for this report was only for the scenario for the https://twitter.com/account/complete endpoint in the initial report. The other DoS scenario you mention in your comment on this report on 4 Jan for https://twitter.com/account/begin_password_reset endpoint was reported to us by a different researcher shortly prior to the initial creation of this report (767458). 

Thank you for thinking of Twitter security!
activities.markdown_message:
Hey @meepmerp, the bounty awarded for this report was only for the scenario for the https://twitter.com/account/complete endpoint in the initial report. The other DoS scenario you mention in your comment on this report on 4 Jan for https://twitter.com/account/begin_password_reset endpoint was reported to us by a different researcher shortly prior to the initial creation of this report (767458).

Thank you for thinking of Twitter security!

activities.message: Please note that as per our recent program report eligibility update, we no longer plan to accept or pay new DoS reports like this that are based on triggering a 5XX error from Twitter. Issues that result in Denial of Service (DoS) to Twitter's servers at the network or application layer are now out of scope for future reports.
activities.markdown_message: Please note that as per our recent program report eligibility update, we no longer plan to accept or pay new DoS reports like this that are based on triggering a 5XX error from Twitter. Issues that result in Denial of Service (DoS) to Twitter's servers at the network or application layer are now out of scope for future reports.
